lines.text: You can give me your word that you'll get them there?

[laughing]
Well colonel, for whatever it's worth, you can have it!

Lassiter... Lassiter... They tell me there is such a man, great killer of my people. Often I think, what kind of man is this Lassiter, that hunts the Apache like the Apache hunts the white eye? Now I look, I see, same as me,
I will tell you why Lassiter comes. To kill, and then to die.
You know I speak true. Here
we are like brothers. Same death, same alone, no wife in hogan, no child, only left to kill, to die.
With new guns, Apache will kill, kill, kill, and white eye never forget what he get from apache, all his blood from wife and child to remind him.
